entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
